title: 15 Spicy Noodle Recipes to Make for Dinner
description: Find spicy noodle recipes to make for dinner tonight, such as Spicy Asian Ramen Noodles, Spicy Pad Thai, and Spicy Cold Soba Noodles. Get the delicious inspiration here.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 15 Spicy Noodle Recipes to Make for Dinner By Corey Williams Corey Williams Corey Williams is a food writer for MyRecipes and Allrecipes. She has a decade of journalism experience. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on June 2, 2021 Close Credits: Buckwheat Queen Looking for a delicious dinner that'll warm your taste buds? Your search ends with this collection of our best spicy noodle recipes featuring fiery ingredients like Sriracha, chili oil, gochujang, and crushed red pepper flakes. We've got something for everyone at your table: From mildly hot ramen and noodle salads that'll please even the pickiest eaters to blazing Thai pastas that aren't for the faint of heart, turn up the heat tonight with one of our favorite spicy noodle ideas. 01 of 17 Spicy Asian Ramen Noodles View Recipe Save Spicy Asian Ramen Noodles. lutzflcat Ramen noodles are tossed in a delicious peanut butter sauce that gets its sweetness from brown sugar and its spiciness from chili-garlic sauce, then topped with green onions and peanuts. Quick Ramen Noodle Dinners 02 of 17 Low-Calorie Spicy Peanut Noodles View Recipe Save France C Make this low-calorie dinner with just seven ingredients: a package of shirataki noodles, powdered peanut butter, soy sauce, Sriracha, stevia, cucumber slices, and a chopped green onion. 03 of 17 Taiwanese Spicy Beef Noodle Soup View Recipe Save thehowesx3 Use your Crock-Pot to make this spicy udon noodle soup with beef stew meat. "A bowl of this in the winter evenings will warm you right up," says recipe creator jhuang0125. 04 of 17 Sweet and Spicy Pork and Napa Cabbage Stir-Fry with Spicy Noodles View Recipe Save SunnyByrd What's the secret ingredient for this restaurant-worthy, stir-fried pasta dinner? Three tablespoons of Thai sweet chili sauce adds irresistible flavor. 05 of 17 Spicy Cold Soba Noodles View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen It couldn't be easier to make these spicy soba noodles with fewer than 10 ingredients, including sesame tahini, balsamic vinegar, molasses, soy sauce, and chili oil. Cold Noodle Recipes for Refreshing Dinners 06 of 17 Spicy Rice Noodle Salad View Recipe Save Pamela Gray Chef John's bold-tasting cold noodle salad comes together in under an hour, so it's the perfect quick and easy dinner for busy weeknights. 07 of 17 Spicy Beef Ramen View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine It couldn't be easier to make this simple dinner with just beef-flavored ramen, shiitake mushrooms, edamame, soy sauce, Sriracha, beef top sirloin, and fresh cilantro. 08 of 17 Spicy Shrimp Pad Thai View Recipe Save Teresa Crowe This delicious shrimp pad thai comes together in under an hour. "Made this as is and it was devoured by my family," says reviewer Mary Beth Means. "We are lovers of pad thai and everyone said it was better than in the restaurants." 09 of 17 Spicy Thai Shrimp Pasta View Recipe Save lutzflcat Make this simple Thai pasta with just five ingredients: rice vermicelli, a large tomato, green onions, cooked shrimp, and prepared Thai peanut sauce. 10 of 17 New on Allrecipes! Look for the 'Buy Ingredients' button on select recipes and add ingredients directly to your online shopping cart with one click. Learn more about shoppable recipes. 11 of 17 Spicy Chicken Noodles View Recipe Save Chef John Looking for a way to use up leftover cooked chicken breast? Your search ends here. "No matter what recipe they're used in, rice noodles are a proven crowd-pleaser," says Chef John. Chef John's Best Quick and Easy Recipes Ready in 45 Minutes or Less 12 of 17 Chicken Yakisoba View Recipe Save Baking Nana Chicken is cooked with cabbage and carrots, then served in a spicy sauce over yakisoba noodles. Top with homemade pickled ginger for a burst of color and flavor. 13 of 17 Easy Spicy Udon Cold Salad View Recipe Save Linda T "This recipe was fantastic," according to reviewer TheStarlite11. "The dressing had key Asian ingredients that really brought the noodles to life!" 14 of 17 Chicken Yaki Udon View Recipe Save Diana71 Thick udon noodles and chicken are tossed in a simple sauce made with gochujang (Korean chile paste), ketchup, soy sauce, and garlic. 15 of 17 Thai Cucumber Salad with Udon Noodles View Recipe Save lutzflcat This refreshing udon noodle salad, sweetened with white sugar and spiced with a minced Thai chile pepper, is topped with cooling cucumber. 16 of 17 Creole Crab Noodles View Recipe Save Chef John's Creole Crab Noodles. Chef John "Crab, and its old friends, the Holy Trinity, are a classic combo, and so it was no surprise they worked so well in an Asian-style rice noodle dish," Chef John says about this "experiment gone right." 17 of 17 More Inspiration OkinawanPrincess Try one of our favorite Cold Noodle Recipes for Refreshing Dinners. Plus, explore our entire collection of Noodle Recipes. Sesame Noodle Salad Amazing Peanut Soba Noodles Vietnamese Lemongrass Beef and Noodles Explore more: Recipes Pasta and Noodles Noodle Recipes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
